statements: SELECT * FROM email_subscriptions
SELECT email_id, email_address FROM email_subscriptions WHERE engagement_level > 3
SELECT * FROM email_subscriptions WHERE segment = 'VIP'
SELECT email_id, email_address, segment FROM email_subscriptions ORDER BY engagement_level DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM email_subscriptions
SELECT email_id, email_address, engagement_level FROM email_subscriptions WHERE segment = 'Product Updates' ORDER BY email_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM email_subscriptions WHERE engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY email_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT email_id, email_address, segment, engagement_level FROM email_subscriptions WHERE segment = 'Promotions' AND engagement_level < 2 ORDER BY engagement_level DESC, email_id ASC;
SELECT email_id, email_address FROM email_subscriptions WHERE segment IS NULL;
SELECT email_id, email_address, segment FROM email_subscriptions WHERE email_id BETWEEN 100 AND 150;
SELECT * FROM email_subscriptions;
SELECT email_address, subscription_date FROM email_subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_subscriptions WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT email_address, is_active FROM email_subscriptions WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_subscriptions WHERE is_active = true ORDER BY subscription_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT email_address FROM email_subscriptions WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY email_address ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT email_address) AS total_emails FROM email_subscriptions;
SELECT es.email_address, cs.segment_name FROM email_subscriptions es JOIN customer_segments cs ON es.subscription_id = cs.customer_id;
SELECT subscription_id, subscription_date FROM email_subscriptions WHERE is_active = true AND email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM SubscriptionList;
SELECT email_address, subscription_date FROM SubscriptionList WHERE engagement_level='high';
SELECT subscription_id, email_address, subscription_date FROM SubscriptionList ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegment WHERE segment_name='VIP';
SELECT engagement_id, customer_id, engagement_date FROM CustomerEngagement WHERE engagement_type='purchase';
SELECT * FROM SubscriptionList WHERE subscription_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT email_address, engagement_level FROM SubscriptionList WHERE engagement_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM SubscriptionList ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;

SELECT s.email_address, e.engagement_date, c.engagement_type FROM SubscriptionList s JOIN CustomerEngagement e ON s.subscription_id = e.customer_id JOIN CustomerSegment c ON e.customer_id = c.segment_id WHERE s.subscription_date < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY e.engagement_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_subscriptions, MAX(subscription_id) AS max_subscription_id FROM SubscriptionList;
SELECT * FROM Email_Subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address FROM Email_Subscribers WHERE engagement_level = 'high';
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, subscription_date FROM Email_Subscribers ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Engagement_Segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM Engagement_Segments ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Email_Subscribers WHERE engagement_level = 'high';
SELECT email_address, subscription_date FROM Email_Subscribers ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;

SELECT s.segment_name, s.description, e.email_address FROM Engagement_Segments s JOIN Segment_Subscriptions ss ON s.segment_id = ss.segment_id JOIN Email_Subscribers e ON ss.subscriber_id = e.subscriber_id;

SELECT ea.email_address, sa.attribute_name, sa.attribute_value FROM Email_Subscribers ea LEFT JOIN Subscriber_Attributes sa ON ea.subscriber_id = sa.subscriber_id WHERE sa.attribute_name LIKE 'interest%';

SELECT ss.subscription_date, es.segment_name, es.description, ea.email_address FROM Segment_Subscriptions ss JOIN Engagement_Segments es ON ss.segment_id = es.segment_id JOIN Email_Subscribers ea ON ss.subscriber_id = ea.subscriber_id ORDER BY ss.subscription_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT list_name, created_date FROM SubscriptionLists WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM Customers WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, e.level_name FROM Customers c JOIN CustomerEngagement ce ON c.customer_id = ce.customer_id JOIN EngagementLevels e ON ce.level_id = e.level_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE engagement_level = 'Medium' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, s.subscription_date FROM Customers c JOIN Subscription s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.list_id = 1 ORDER BY s.subscription_date DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, el.level_name FROM Customers c JOIN CustomerEngagement ce ON c.customer_id = ce.customer_id JOIN EngagementLevels el ON ce.level_id = el.level_id;
SELECT sl.list_name, COUNT(s.customer_id) AS total_subscriptions FROM SubscriptionLists sl LEFT JOIN Subscription s ON sl.list_id = s.list_id GROUP BY sl.list_name HAVING total_subscriptions > 2;
